CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS facts (
    id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    text TEXT NOT NULL,
    source VARCHAR(255),
    source_url TEXT,
    language VARCHAR(10),
    permalink TEXT
);
